name: The Deep Sea Voyage
description:
Explore underwater caves in your submarine and discover new marine species while surviving the murky threats of the deep sea.
There are 15 species to be found which are divided by 5 in each level!

The deeper you go, the darker and harder the game gets!

Controls

PC Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move your submarine.

E to shoot sea urchins at hostile sea animals.

Android Controls:

Use the joystick to maneuver your sub.

Press the button with a sea urchin image in it to fire sea urchins at unfriendly aquatic marines.

You can adjust button positions via the options menu.

Credits

Jeremiah Jelfery

Aayesha Fazal
